name: Right Direction
tagline: Everything is possible for those who believe.
description:
We are experienced in working for different clients and brands. We have built very good relationships with most influential medias, bloggers and personalities in Bulgaria. Storytelling is our secret to connect with influencers, to engage audiences, to develop brands and companies. We believe in the power of integrated marketing communications and we mix different channels to achieve the best results. We create hybrid campaigns in both the digital and traditional media space.
We love to create partnerships and collaborations with relevant journalists and bloggers. Our main aim is our clients to become more visible and their business more successful. That is why we offer a complete communication services. Our clients are also our friends. We connect with them, with their mission and vision to develop not only their communications, but also their whole business.
